"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import * as XLSX from "xlsx" const InvoicePaymentDetails = () => { const [paymentDetails, setPaymentDetails] = useState([]) // Mock data for invoice payment details const mockPaymentDetails = [ { id: 1, supplier: "ABC Construction Materials", material: "Portland Cement", quantityOrdered: "50.00 tons", totalAmount: "250000.00", ReceivedAmount: "150000.00", pendingAmount: "100000.00", }, { id: 2, supplier: "XYZ Steel Suppliers", material: "TMT Steel Bars", quantityOrdered: "100.00 tons", totalAmount: "4500000.00", paidAmount: "4500000.00", pendingAmount: "0.00", }, { id: 3, supplier: "PQR Sand & Gravel", material: "River Sand", quantityOrdered: "200.00 cubic meters", totalAmount: "300000.00", ReceivedAmount: "100000.00", pendingAmount: "200000.00", }, ] useEffect(() => { const savedPaymentDetails = localStorage.getItem("invoicePaymentDetails") if (savedPaymentDetails) { setPaymentDetails(JSON.parse(savedPaymentDetails)) } else { setPaymentDetails(mockPaymentDetails) localStorage.setItem("invoicePaymentDetails", JSON.stringify(mockPaymentDetails)) } }, []) const exportToExcel = () => { const worksheet = XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(paymentDetails) const workbook = XLSX.utils.book_new() XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(workbook, worksheet, "Invoice Payment Details") XLSX.writeFile(workbook, "invoice_payment_details.xlsx") } const getTotalAmount = () => { return paymentDetails.reduce((sum, detail) => sum + Number.parseFloat(detail.totalAmount), 0).toFixed(2) } const getTotalRece = () => { return paymentDetails.reduce((sum, detail) => sum + Number.parseFloat(detail.paidAmount), 0).toFixed(2) } const getTotalPending = () => { return paymentDetails.reduce((sum, detail) => sum + Number.parseFloat(detail.pendingAmount), 0).toFixed(2) } return (
ðŸ’³
